subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Johan Santana threw three innings for a Class A squad, while at Citi Field, Justin Turner had the game-winning hit after starter Mike Pelfrey kept the Mets in the game.
snippet: Johan Santana threw three innings for a Class A squad, while at Citi Field, Justin Turner had the game-winning hit after starter Mike Pelfrey kept the Mets in the game.
